definition: to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout

sentences.english: The gravity of a black hole is so strong that not even light can escape it.
sentences.chinese: 黑洞的引力場很強，光也無法逃出。

sentences.english: If you think,for example,a gravitational field.
It is the gravitational field and mass flow field that the gravitational wave is produced by the induction each other.
sentences.chinese: 正是引力場與質流場相互感應導致引力波。
